title: The Cursed Ship - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Magic   Male Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist
author: Pickled Vegetables in Jar
description:
A mystical magic formation bestows ships with the power to evolve. In an eerie world, a young man from a fishing village cobbles together a boat with pieces of broken wooden planks, marking the beginning of his journey to greatness… 

The evolving vessel, is also known as a ‘cursed vessel’… 

(Note: The protagonist began his journey in modern-day Europe in a parallel world, not just some place with a medieval high-fantasy setting.)>
